subject: Fashion
title: Digital Fashion and NFT Clothing
description: A micro-lesson that makes Digital Fashion and NFT Clothing usable.

hook.text: People are paying real money for clothes that exist only on screens. Welcome to digital fashion.

buildup.text: Digital garments are worn in photos, social media, and virtual worldsâ€”never physically manufactured.

discovery.text: Zero fabric, zero water, zero shipping. A digital dress has nearly zero environmental footprint.

twist.text: NFT fashion ran on energy-hungry blockchains, and most projects collapsed when the crypto hype faded.

climax.text: The concept survives: dressing your avatar matters where online identity rivals the physical one.

punchline.text: Virtual clothes, real identity. No closet required.

quiz.question: What is the primary environmental advantage of digital fashion?
options: It uses renewable energy for all blockchain transactions
It reduces screen time and encourages offline activities
It requires zero physical materials, water, or shipping
